1.text: Oh, you must be the new hire. Don’t touch the fryer until you’ve had your orientation, understood?

options.text: 1. What’s so special about the fryer?
2. I just wanted to ask about the night shift.
3. I heard someone went missing here.

2.text: Special? Hah. Just hot oil and discipline. Nothing ‘special’ about it.

options.text: 1. The homeless guy says it talks.

3.text: Night shift’s where we separate the strong from the useless. You’ll do fine... as long as you don’t wander.

4.text: People love rumors. The only thing missing around here is punctuality.

5.text: That vagrant behind the dumpster? He also says the sky hums. Ignore him. He eats grease straight from the filters.

options.text: 2. He might be right about the fryer.

6.text: Watch your tone. Curiosity is a quick way to get burned around here.

7.text: Out back. Past the dumpsters. There’s... waste. Just don’t go there. Not at night.

8.text: Salt? Hah... that old trick. Don’t believe everything you hear. Nothing’s alive here. Nothing that shouldn’t be.

9.text: Listen close. You’re here to serve burgers, not secrets. Everyone who pries ends up part of the recipe.

10.text: You’ll find out soon enough. The fryer’s hungry, and we’re running low on beef.
